Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.ToolLoader
          This class will be removed after VelocityTools 1.1 
 

Deprecated Fields
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.servlet.ServletToolInfo.APPLICATION_SCOPE
          use ViewContext.APPLICATION 
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.servlet.ServletToolInfo.REQUEST_SCOPE
          use ViewContext.REQUEST 
org.apache.velocity.tools.view.servlet.ServletToolInfo.SESSION_SCOPE
          use ViewContext.SESSION 
 

Deprecated Methods
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getActionErrors(HttpServletRequest)
          use StrutsUtils.getErrors(HttpServletRequest request). 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getActionFormBeans(ServletContext)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getActionForward(String, ServletContext)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getActionForwards(ServletContext)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getActionMapping(String, ServletContext)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getActionMappingName(String)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getActionMappings(ServletContext)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getActionMessages(HttpServletRequest)
          use StrutsUtils.getMessages(HttpServletRequest request). 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getCancelName()
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getDataSource(ServletContext)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getException(HttpServletRequest)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.DateTool.getFormattedDate(String)
          use DateTool.get(String format) instead. This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getFormBean(String, ServletContext)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getGlobalErrorName()
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.ErrorsTool.getGlobalName()
          This will be removed after VelocityTools 1.1. 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.MessageTool.getLocale()
          This does not fit the purpose of MessageTool and will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getMessageResources(ServletContext)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getMultipartRequestWrapper(HttpServletRequest)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getServletMapping(ServletContext)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.struts.StrutsUtils.getTokenName()
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2 
org.apache.velocity.tools.generic.MathTool.roundToInt(Object)
          This will be removed in VelocityTools 1.2. Use #round(Object num) instead.
